entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
WIDESPREAD DENSE FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
WIDESPREAD DENSE FOG IN THE MORNING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
